title: Retail Financial Services: Fair Treatment for All
abstractText: We carry out  three impact studies. Of these, two are linked and focus on consumer evaluations of relationships with financial services providers, the other is focused on how providers might manage interactions with customers. The linked projects - trust and fairness are supported by frequent ad-hoc and short interactions with a diversity of stakeholders across the industry. The other study, on new service development, is designed to link closely with the placements element of the scheme.
